description:
Kuma is ordered by the World Government to obliterate every living being on the island, but the Straw Hats – battered as they may be – refuse to go down without a fight!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gli incredibili poteri del frutto Pad Pad
It Repels Everything! Kuma`s Paw-Paw Power!
Le pouvoir des coussinets : Kuma peut tout repousser
Subete o Hajiku: Kuma no Nikyunikyu no Chikara
Способности плода Никю-Никю. Полное отражение всего
تصدّ كلّ شيء! قوّة كفّ كوما!
すべてを弾く くまのニキュニキュの能力[ちから]
